title: Katmai National Park & Preserve: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved       Do Business with Us: Like our non-profit partners, our business partners play an integral role in connecting the public to this place. If you run a travel or tourism business and want to do business within Katmai, read up on commercial use authorizations here. I Found Katmai: As the National Park Service approaches its 100th anniversary, this is an important time to reflect on the importance of national parks. Through 2016, we want you to share how Katmai and national parks are important. NPS Centennial: 2016 is the 100th birthday of the National Park Service. Find out what we're doing to get ready, and look for ways that you can help! Planning: The planning process is how the public can express opinions in the management of a national park. Find out if any current opportunities exist to share your voice, or browse past planning documents. Support Your Park: Public support is a critical component in the management of National Park Service lands. From volunteering to making a donation to shopping in our bookstore, there are many ways that the public can support Katmai National Park and Preserve. Work with Us: Keep an eye out for year-round or summer seasonal positions in Katmai. Most seasonal jobs are advertised November through January.
